Reviews.Title: WHY
Reviews.Author: V. Roger Rubin
Reviews.Content: Why is the G12 more expensive than the G15- which is a better and far more versatile camera. I own the 12 and it's very good, but the 2.8 lens is limiting. I also own the G1X whichis in a different class- but the price difference between the 12 and 15 makes no sense.

ProductInfo.Features:
10MP CCD Image Sensor
DIGIC 4 Image Processor
1280 x 720p HD Video Capture
2.8" Vari-Angled LCD
JPEG and RAW File Image Capture
SD/SDHC/SDXC/MMC/MMC+/HCMMC+ Card Slot
28mm Lens with 5x Optical Zoom Hybrid IS
Optical Image Stabilization
Stereo Sound for Video
Manual Exposure Control
ProductInfo.Name: PowerShot G12 by Canon 10 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.8 Inch Vari-Angle LCD
